alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:29PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Luna and southwestern Dona Ana Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 829 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles east of Columbus, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camel Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
